page.title: 10BROUGHTY FERRY - TRADE
page.content: Today Broughty Ferry has a bustling shopping centre with many specialist shops in which to browse. Its fine sea-front provides for many water sports such as swimming, boating and wind-surfing. Broughty Ferry could be described as a self-contained shopping and business centre, developed around the old fishing village. It provides a full range of services and amenities with much to interest the holiday-maker. The traders of Broughty Ferry get most of their custom from two main sources. On an all year round basis there is a large local population, many of whom work elsewhere, mainly Dundee, and commute from Broughty Ferry. In addition there is an influx of holiday-makers during the summer months.
